In England, in the seven days to 17 April, there were 13,423 new confirmed cases (23.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 10 April, there were 16,148 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 17% (2,725 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 22 April is 3,843,260 (6,828 cases per 100,000 population).
